attributes.action: Temporarily stop foreign aid to help us fight Covid19
attributes.additional_details: To help the UK as a nation and put more money into the nhs and other emergency services to help fight Covid19.
attributes.background: Stop foreign aid immediately but temporarily. We  need all the resources we can get our hands on at this difficult and worrying time. We need to support our NHS, other emergency services and our ever decreasing economy to help fight and defeat Covid19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304418

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
